Input tones (separated by a space): L Lb
Input tones (separated by a space): L Lb

My first interpretation was that this token was divided into two tone groups, resulting in a M.L+L tone pattern instead of the expected pattern L.L. But one would then expect the second tone group to receive a final H tone, since all-L tone groups are not allowed. This would yield /jo˧ | ʈʰɯ˩-ze˩˥/, which is not the observed form. Later it was found that this combination allowed two tone variants: L.L, but also M.L.
Input tones (separated by a space): L Lb
